timeline.bodyText: @sherrif10 The declaration here should be Obs toOpenmrsType(Observation observation), i.e., translating from a FHIR Observation object to an OpenMRS Obs.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: This should also be changed to public Obs to OpenmrsType(Observation fhirObservation)
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: This should go right above the @Setter annotation.
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: O k let me do it now
replies.author: sherrif10

timeline.bodyText: Remember that you need to rename the observationTranslator field to translator
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: Am not getting you by here renaming ObservationTranslator to translator
replies.author: sherrif10

replies.bodyText: The field called observationTranslator in this class should be named translator.
replies.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: This should be private ObservationTranslator translator;
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: What's happening here is that we're using Lombok to automatically generate a getter and setter for the field. By naming the field translator, Lombok automatically generates a getTranslator() function, which the BaseFhirService class requires. But the type of translator (i.e., what it's translating between) doesn't change. As-is, this won't compile correctly.
replies.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: Actually i was asking my self why we change to translator but thanks
replies.author: sherrif10

timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Last thing. This should be return toOpenmrsType(new Obs(), fhirObservation); That way, it actually does something.
timeline.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: This time travis has taken long to cope up with building
replies.author: sherrif10

timeline.message:
FM2-155 : Update ObservationDAO and Service

https://issues.openmrs.org/browse/FM2-155
